ComicInfo.Penciller: Charles Vess,Gary Davis,Eddie Campbell,Peter Mullins,April Post,Charles Vess,Gary Davis,Eddie Campbell,Peter Mullins,April Post
ComicInfo.Summary: Acclaimed fantasy author Jane Yolen and artist Charles Vess tell the tale of "King Henry," part of a semi-regular series teaming Vess with famous authors to adapt famous ballads to comics. Also: Hermes' mighty Caduceus disguised as a baseball bat! A Mafia princess on the lam! A talking skull in a box! It could only be Eddie Campbell's Hermes vs. The Eyeball Kid! Plus, romance at the dawn of man in part 2 of an all-new Paleolove adventure.
ComicInfo.Title: Skeleton in the Closet
